review_text: Lovely lake house to enjoy sunsets and good bass fishing. Our dogs loved the large fenced-in yard and the hosts are great communicators. We look forward to returning!

This is an excellent place for a quiet getaway. The view of the lake from the backyard is beautiful and peaceful. My stay was for a business trip, so I couldn't take advantage of the lake or the boats they have to use, but I'm sure it would be fun. The house is old but clean, functional, and comfortable. The couches in the living area are comfortable and offer a great view of the backyard and the lake, and the pool table would be great entertainment for a family or small group of friends.
We really enjoyed our stay. The home is spacious with a gorgeous view of the lake. Kitchen was well stocked, abd the home was clean.
Excellent location for bird watchers and fishermen!

This was one of our favorite Air B and B’s…and we have been to a lot! Very well appointed, so much fun! Many things to do and so peaceful. Our pups loved running around the huge yard! We felt so comfortable. It was a great reprieve for two Florida teachers! We definitely will return!

I was very pleased with the location and amenities. Right from booking Phil was very communicative and helpful. Loved the big fenced yard for my dogs and peaceful sunsets over the lake.
Everything in the house was comfortable and clean. I will certainly be staying there again in the future.
the house was very comfortable. sunsets beautiful, everything you needed. good location to town. enjoyed our stay.
Amazing place that we will be returning to!

This was our second time staying here and we would definitely come back again. The scenery is beautiful, great views and wildlife would always visit on the dock. It’s like a home away from home. Great space and pretty comfortable. They were extremely communicative and check in was easy, even though we didn’t get there until after 8:30pm/9pm the night of check in. I would recommend this host to anyone and would definitely recommend this home for anyone needing a place to stay in the area. It’s close to everything you would need and not fair at all from Sebring that has even more to offer (15 mins if that from Publix).
Wonderful for dogs and everyone!!
I had a wonder stay at the lake house! It felt like i was at home, the views looking over the lake are breathtaking
Sonya and Phil are great hosts. Cozy, clean and convenient location. We will be back.

Weather was cloudy and it drizzled during my stay, but it didn't damper anything. I enjoyed it even more without the beating sun and didn't need to turn on the ac. The air was clean inside and out. Picture-perfect view of the lake and beautiful moss-covered, large oak trees from the comfort of the cozy and spacious family room's nearly wall-to-wall windows--great layout. I saw a group of cute ducks in the morning dunking their heads in the water for food and shaking their tails in the air. There is sand and the water is clear. Plenty of equipment for fishing and spending time on the lake. Overall, very serenely peaceful and ultra-relaxing and the hosts are a friendly and responsive couple.

This place is a diamond in the rough! Like a trip to camp as a child. The sunsets are hallmark quality. We werent real active, but enjoyed lots of eating, movies, football and sitting outside .
Very relaxing. Quiet atmosphere.
Looking forward to another stay in the summer time. Would love to walk out on the dock.
The hosts are very nice, pleasant, accomodating and responsive
This Lake house property is the perfect getaway .
Our third time here and was once again a great experience. Highly recommend
It was a great location while we were in the area for work. Phil and Sonya were very helpful!
Once again was a great stay. 2nd time staying here within 2 week period and very happy.

We stayed for business related and our experience with Phil and Sonya was above and beyond. Their home was excellent and very welcoming. We all enjoyed our stay and will definetly come back next round.
Thank you Phil and Sonya!!!!

This was our 3rd stay at the lake House. We always enjoy our selfs with all there is to do. Fishing early mornings, Bass and bluegill. Horse shoes on beach and corn hole. Game of pool at night. Enjoying the nature, owl, Sandhill Cranes. Our Greyhound loves the full fenced yard and laying on the beach. The house is always clean and comfortable. I personally just love this this place! Being from Michigan it reminds me of going up north to the cottage. clean and comfortable..
Thank you
Phil and Sonya
Ice always in the freezer and stocked with bags. Don’t forget your beach towels. We always put a foot rinse bucket on the back porch. :) see you next time.

We really enjoyed our relaxing time at this lakehouse. The inside was a bit dated, but fine and comfortable for a low key trip and very consistent with the advertised pictures. The owner communicated upfront about the fact that the dock was unusable due to damage from Hurricane Ian. The provided kayaks were also a bonus. We cooked most of our meals at the house and didn't find that we were missing anything essential in the kitchen. There was also a separate wet bar area in the living room with a sink and mini-fridge which made for a nice place to make coffee and keep drinks cold. Overall, we will likely plan to come back for another stay in the future.

Thanks Phil & Sonya, your place was as we had been informed it would be. Big beautiful house, excellent lake access. House well stocked with everything you needed to stay. Also well stocked with things to do outside. Privacy and feeling safe to stay there was excellent. Clean linens and very comfortable beds and pillows. Plenty of tv access and games. We even caught fish! Thanks again
Phil and Sonya were both very friendly and accommodating, felt like old friends. We truly enjoyed our time here. We hope to stay here again.
Nice place to stay, would stay again!
Sonya and Phil were very friendly. the house very comfortable. everything you could think of was provided. the lake was beautiful plus the sunsets.! hope to go back again sometime.

We spent a few days at the lake house for Christmas. The house was so lovely and quaint. We had everything we needed and more. The new pool table was great fun and the sunsets were so gorgeous over the lake. Phil and Sonya were extremely helpful when the heat wasn't working on Christmas eve. They made a special trip to come and check everything out for us and it turned out to be an easy fix. They even brought extra blankets and a space heater just in case. We loved our time there!

We love this house. It has everything you need and more! The lake views are mesmerizing!
Great place to disconnect and enjoy nature.
Great place to stay with lots to do. Between being right on the lake and having a pool table and a number of games, there is always something to do during your downtime. Would definitely recommend!
Lovely!!
We really enjoyed our stay! Beautiful sunsets out back on the lake and golf courses nearby.

We will definitely return to this house, we spent a few super quiet and relaxed days, our pup had a lot of fun in the large yard and swimming in the lake, everything was great and Phil was very attentive in everything, I recommend it without hesitation .

Phil's house is great. It's stocked to the brim with kitchen utensils and spices. There are kayaks and a canoe to use. The rec room with the tv and pool table is great. There's plenty of space to spread out. The sunsets over the lake are among the most beautiful we've seen. This is a really relaxing space, and Phil is easy to talk to.
We enjoyed our stay.
Great place to unwind and relax. Peaceful and beautiful! Great hosts who went out of their way to accommodate. Can’t wait to return.

We were pleasantly surprised by this lake house. It had more than we could have asked for including kayaks, a canoe, a fishing boat, outdoor games, indoor games, the most beautiful sunsets, and all of the amenities necessary to make this place feel like home. Phil and Sonya are attentive and quick to reply. We appreciate the open communication and opening up their lovely home for others to enjoy. We will definitely be back.
Beautiful home and great hosts. We look forward to booking again.

We usually come to Sebring for the races and stay at the hotel, however, this time we decided to stay at an Airbnb by one of these beautiful lakes. We were lucky enough to find this cozy home away from home.
Phil & Sonia were great hosts! Responded very quickly, and were very accommodating. Sonia was also great at communicating with us and checked we were OK during our stay. I mean we couldn’t ask for better!!! Check-in instructions were super detailed and helpful, the house was also clean. Overall a wonderful place; we would stay here again easily! We would definitely book again.

What a great house, it has truly been our home away from home for a week!
There are so many things to do, both inside and outside of the house, you almost feel it’s wrong to leave it and be elsewhere. The swing on the dock is pure delight for your soul.
Would definitely recommend and gladly stay again given the opportunity.
Thanks Sonya and Phil, we have really appreciated how attentive and accommodating hosts you have been!
Clean and spacious with an amazing lake view. Phil was an amazing host!!! Two thumbs up

Staying at this lake house was such a wonderful experience! Loved the location and fenced area, which was great for our pup to run around and play. The guys took out the Jon boat and kayaks to fish every morning and came back with a few great ones! The hammock and swinging benches were nice and relaxing. Beds were confortable, place was clean, full kitchen to cook was great. We had a really nice time at the lake house. Nothing bad to say. Can’t wait to come back in the future!

Nice place on the lake with covered dock, sunset view, lots of lake toys, a little sand beach area and a fenced in yard for your pooches. House was older but well taken care of and clean. I have no complaints and would definitely recommend.
Could not have asked for anything more. Wonderful time.
very nice view all around, my family enjoy the stay very much.

Loved loved the Lake House trust me you will not want to leave, getting up going fishing off the dock and closing the day with beautiful sunsets. The best part was our pup got to come we hardly left the property ..so relaxing and great communication with the owners. Only one suggestion is bring your Firestick for the TV so glad we did we were able to watch Netflix ect. Home was clean and had everything you needed there and beyond. 100 stars!
Excellent property to relax and have a great family time outside from the city.

This lake house is very comfortable and has great amenities such as floats, yard games, a hammock under the trees. The lake is beautiful and there are several canoes, kayaks and a little John boat. The dock is large, private and covered which makes it the perfect place to catch that lake breeze on the dock swing. The front and back yard are fully fenced (my German Shepherd could jump the fence so if you have an escape artist…). There were no close neighbor dogs when we were there if you have a reactive pup. The kitchen is fully furnished with kitchenware, even a crockpot and air fryer. The outside grill is small so if you want to grill meat and sides for a family of four, you may need to cook in batches. The beds are super comfortable, the furniture in the den cozy. There is traffic noise from the road which is my only complaint but it’s not heard in the house. Our family spent a whole week there and rarely had to leave. It was our home away from home and we really enjoyed staying there.
house is great, plenty of room, love the lake and close to everything
We had an amazing and relaxing time here on the lake!! We were very comfortable during our stay and our hosts were very accommodating! I would recommend it!
Had another great stay at the lake house. Very nice place to stay! We'll do it again.
Great communication very lovely home
One of the best things about The Lake House is the boat dock. You can walk out sit on the swing and enjoy the lake. It’s a great place to stay!

Beautiful view of the lake. Sunsets are spectacular on the dock!
Excellent location for golf courses.
Fully fenced in yard is great for dogs!

We had a wonderful stay at the lakehouse! Very comfortable with every amenity you can think of. Sunsets on the swinging chair out on the boat dock were serene. Comfortable beds. AC nice and cold. Very accommodating and responsive hosts. Highly recommend!
This is the perfect location if you want to relax and unwind. Did the job, so much fun!

This has been our third stay at Phil and Sonya’s lake house. They are wonderful hosts and the home has everything you need for a peaceful getaway. Gorgeous sunsets and bass can be caught right from the dock. We love the fenced in yard for the dogs too!
Our group very much enjoyed our stay. Home is nice with a gorgeous view of the lake. Beautiful dock with a chair swing at the end to enjoy the sunset. Will hopefully be back.

Our stay was very relaxing and peaceful. The furniture was comfortable. We love the backyard, the dog had plenty of room to play. The house was very clean and have everything we needed. The hosts were great! I recommend staying there.
A quiet place with tons of stuff to do on property if you like to kayak, enjoy cornhole or other indoor and outdoor games. Enjoy the sunsets on a quiet lakefront cottage.

Very comfortable and relaxing. So nice to sit on your private beach. Quiet lake with spectacular sunsets! Close to Avon Park and Sebring, some really good restaurants 18 East and Cowpoke watering hole for a couple. Phil and Sonja had the house clean and well stocked with everything (even a cast iron skillet)! Safe and quiet neighborhood. Will definitely try to stay here again next time we plan to be in the area!

We had a very relaxing stay! The lake is so peaceful and the sunsets are incredible.We kayaked, canoed, and even took the Jon Boat out. Nice touch having the trolling motor to get around. Built a fire in the outside pit, played pool after dark and enjoyed having the little bar area with a separate mini fridge. The beds are comfortable and we slept great! Checkin was seamless and communication was good. Would recommend for a peaceful getaway.

We loved our stay at the lake house, the property was great, did some fishing, kayaking, and even had an otter visit us on the dock to eat his fish. The house was cozy and well stocked and just what we needed. We hope to return!
Very nice place to stay. Our trip was great. Highly recommend!
Great view of Lake Letta. The home is spacious and equipped well for a family to stay. Many thanks for hosting us.

The lake house was ana maxing experience for my family. Fishing, swimming, grilling, amazing sunsets all in one place. The house is super clean and comfortable. Highly recommend staying at Phil’s house for a Great Lake house experience.
A wonderful spot on the lake. Very comfortable. Great communication from the hosts.
Beautiful home and a very welcoming host

We loved staying at this property. Phil and Sonya made it incredibly easy and had the house ready with everything we may need. Waking up in the morning and having coffee on a peaceful quiet lake is the best way to start the day imo. I will definitely try and stay here again when I'm in the area.
Cozy

Great place! More than big enough to comfortably accommodate our family of four. Beautiful relaxing location, with plenty of things to do such as kayaking and shooting pool. Phil was a great host, check in was seamless and communication was easy throughout. Would definitely recommend!
The house was very clean and great location for our stay. I did get to fish a little and caught somedecent bass! would definitely stay again!
The house is cozy and pretty well located, and the lake view is fantastic. Phil was always willing to help us if something came up.

Very tidy and lovely house right on the lake. Very relaxing. It has everything you need to feel right at home. Plenty of activities to do while your there, from kayaking on the lake to playing pool. I definitely recommend it to everyone.

We enjoyed our stay at this property very much, it is extremely quiet and very private. The host is responsive and provides equipment for all kinds of indoor and outdoor activities. We will definitely stay again and I highly recommend his place.
Great location, very accommodating hosts. So much to do you won’t be able to get to all of it. Lake was beautiful and nights were quiet by the fire. But don’t forget the bug spray!
very nice!

We really enjoyed our stay at this home. It's family friendly with lots of activities for adults/kids and they are of both the indoor and outdoor varieties too! The house is spacious so we had plenty of room to spread out and relax. The house was clean and had everything we needed to be able to cook and do laundry. Our host was very easy to communicate with and responded quickly. Finally, the views of the lake are spectacular. I can say that the pictures are exactly as you see them of the lake, the dock and the scenery. The sunsets were amazing!!

Great large Lake house, we really enjoyed staying here. We were minutes away from restaurants and golf course and were also in a very quiet and peaceful area. Lake is beautiful. House came with kayaks, large boat deck. Great place to do some fishing. Our trip was mainly to golf but would definitely stay here again for all the lake activities. Thank you Phil.

Our family of 5 had the most amazing time here. The kids played all day in the water , playing pool and ping pong there’s also plenty of games for outside. The kayaks boat with motor and canoe where super fun too. I have been staying in airbnbs for years and this where the best and nicest hosts , we are definitely coming back

We had a great stay. 5 stars
It felt like being up north not pretentious and locals very friendly. The weather was great and fishing was amazing. We enjoyed the house and game room in the great room. Wet bar area with extra fridge, we used daily. We never left the house other than to get bait at Hendricks the local store. They have beer, wine, tackle and lottery. The extra large dock and yard along with use of kayaks and small boat was a big bonus. Cooked all meals at house. Had everything needed to stay put. :) we will be back.
Thank you Phil and Sonya
Michelle and Aaron
Boca Raton, Fl

Lovely place to relax. 5 stars start to finish! Tons to do and explore (or hang in the hammock and do nothing!)
Easy living!
The 2nd bath has a door to the outside and a walk in shower with a hand held shower head. Great for rinsing off after playing on the beach before going into the rest of the house. Absolutely perfect for dog paws.
Hosts were kind and communicative. Highly recommend.
3 bedrooms, and 2 full bathrooms plus laundry! This is a great place, great rate!
Absolutely perfect get-away! Had everything we needed and so much more! Host were super friendly and super responsive! Can’t wait to stay again!
We really enjoyed our stay! We had everything we needed and more. The house was clean and had enough activities to keep us busy. We would definitely recommend staying here.

We really enjoyed the place, the location, and the amenities that were offered were great!
Overall it was an amazing stay and we would definitely book this place again in the future. :)

Second time we have stayed here, we love it! It’s a comfortable, safe house and yard for our toddler to explore and we find it so relaxing to sit by the lake. Phil and Sonya are very responsive and helpful!
A very great and relaxing place to stay! We love it here!

This is a great old Florida home on a beautiful lake with pretty sunsets. Having grown up in Florida we appreciate the homey and comfortable vibe this lake house provides. Lots of water activities you can do here. Quiet and peaceful place.

Phil and Sonya provide a great home away from home. Beautiful lake and easy access. There are a variety of activities and games available along with kayaks to cruise the lake with. Great place to just chill and get away from the everyday routine. Felt clean and comfortable at their place. Great location to many parks as well. Excellent communication.

Had a great time, no fish. Not sure if it wasn't season. Kids had fun on kayaks, playing pool and playing in the lake. Kitchen was small, but rest of house was very spacious. My favorite part was sitting out back, relaxing and looking at the lake. So peaceful!!
The lake house was great. My kids and I enjoyed fishing and kayaking. The house was comfy and spacious.

Phil and Sonya’s home on the lake is lovely and a wonderful getaway! This was our second stay and it was really neat to be in the area during the orange harvest. We look forward to returning in the future.

This home was a perfect location for us. There was a great selection of indoor and outdoor toys to entertain our teens. Very relaxing place to stay and we felt very comfortable there. Beautiful lake and sunsets.
Brilliant house with a nice setting. Lots of extras provided and all was clean and tidy. We really enjoyed our stay and it worked well for getting to Sebring Raceway
Perfect all around. Cozy and clean.
A wonderful retreat with beautiful sunsets!!
Awesome location with access to a beautiful lake. Big yard, cute house that’s very comfortable.
Phil's place is the exact place for a gateway, just 2hours from our home, nice & cosy , a lot of space. The yard was perfect for our dog & we did enjoy the lakeview, it was very relaxing!
Incredible lake house full of amenities. It was our second stay and we will repeat!
Nice view. Enjoyed the sunsets, the kayaks, fire pit.
Would highly recommend this comfortable lake house especially if you like space and a well equipped kitchen. Great view
Great place. Used it for work so didn’t get the full benefit of the lake. But it’s a really pretty place.
Place is wonderful. Plenty of things to do. Variety of indoor and outdoor games. Use of kayaks and Jon Boat as well. Very Clean.

Phil’s place is fantastic. Plenty of space to spread out and a quiet retreat on the lake. Tons of things for the family to do. Communication was great and we had everything we needed. Just note there is one bathroom if you bring a large group.
Beautiful and private house. Beautiful sunsets from the dock. Huge fenced in property for dogs. Great and fast communication with the owners.

The place was the nicest we have ever stayed in. It was so warm and cozy. So many amenities to choose from such as kayaking, ping pong/pool table, family games for both indoors and out, a huge fireplace, fire pit, bbq grill, 2 porch swings, a fenced in yard if you have pets, a large picture window overlooking the lake- all the necessities of home. We will definitely go back another time.

This lovely lake house is more than what I expected. I was hesitant to book it as I thought lake Letta is not big enough😀 . But it turned out that Lake Letta is the best as the water is so clean and the whole lake is so tranquil (it is big) the whole time. The lake house stands out with the beautiful dock and my family enjoyed a lot with fishing and sunsets sightseeing on it. The lake house has more than enough amenities to give us what we need during the stay. The house was built many years ago but has been maintained very well and spotless. Highlights: My puppy got so excited running in the huge fenced front yard; fishing and got big size bass and crappie, and cook fish over fire pit; amazing sunset and sunrise; placid lake with lots of privacy; quick and easy communication! Thanks a lot for sharing your beautiful lake house!
Amazing lake house full of amenities. Absolutely recommended. We can’t wait to go back!

Extremely grateful for a place on the lake packed with awesome amenities as we were running back and forth between grandparents place and your home. Clear attention was given to the entire space to include whatever is needed. I can sense the care. We enjoyed our stay immensely!
Great place to stay and relax!!!! Definitely will stay again when in the area.
Clean spacious home. Perfect for rest and relaxing lakeside. Something Awesome to do for the entire family.

We had a lovely stay at Phil and Sonya's lake home. They were excellent communicators and the home was spotless and comfortable. Our pup loved the large fenced-in yard and joining us on the dock. The bass were biting and the sunsets were lovely...we cannot wait to return. Thanks for a wonderful weekend on Lake Letta!
Not to far from the race track at a great rate.
Absolutely peaceful and an amazing home! Amazing view and would definitely highly recommend! Can’t wait to stay again!
Thank you for an amazing stay! So much to do, love the dock, beautiful FL sunsets, excellent hospitality! We love your property and will be back again for sure 😁
Great little place!
Awesome location. Big fenced yard for dogs to hangout in and great fishing too. Will definitely be back again!

Great experience. The home was exactly as described in the listing in terms of location, features, and amenities. Lots of fun stuff to do to entertain yourself and the family. Especially enjoyed the kayaks and fabulous dock out over the beautiful lake. Great communication back and forth as our stay neared. Would return for sure

We are in love with this lake house and all it has to offer. The lake view is spectacular, the surroundings very serene and the house has so many fun amenities. We loved kayaking in the lake, grilling in the patio and playing ping pong.
A great place to enjoy quality time with family and/or friends. Plus, my dog had tons of fun running in the yard chasing lizards :-D
We will definitely go back!

Owners responded very quickly and made this process extremely easy. My parents enjoyed their weekend and loved the view. My dad was able to fish off the doc and there were a lot of things available to use. Would highly recommend.
Great Lake House. Cozy but very spacious. The multiple Kayaks were great and the dock was perfect. The Lake is large with lots to explore. Will be back very soon.

We spent Labor Day weekend here and especially loved having use of the kayaks and jon boat! We played pool and ping-pong, and enjoyed relaxing on the swing on the dock. In Covid -times, it was a pleasure to see no one & have a peaceful retreat!

Great lake house! Stayed with my wife, baby, and dog and we had a blast. Especially loved the beach, dock, and water activities! Owners are super responsive and care for their guests and the property.
Excellent location and an awesome quiet lake that offered fun and exciting getaway we needed. Highly recommend.
This Airbnb was perfect!! Phil has a beautiful lake house with a ton of thoughtful and great amenities. We had a lot of fun during our weekend stay and highly recommend this Airbnb!!!

I came to sebring to visit family , The house was amazing huge and everything was there for us to have an amazing day on the lake my kids enjoy it so much, they have so many things available to make a day out of the lake, ( 4 kayaks, a John boat, a paddle boat, corn hole, a pool table, ping pong/ beer pong) deff Recommended hope to come back again😉

Phil and Sonya were so attentive and welcoming. We had such a wonderful stay! The house is cozy and the dock has such a beautiful view! This is a wonderful place to relax, disconnect, and spend family time together. Our dog loved swimming in the lake and we enjoyed using the kayaks. Definitely recommended, we hope to come back again.
It was wonderful. We loved it so much.

The owners were awesome with their communication throughout our stay. They had the lakehouse clean and ready to go. Comfy accommodations inside including three beds, a pool table, ping pong table, cable tv, and more. The use of the kayaks were a highlight across the beautiful lake. Gorgeous sunsets and long dock to fish from. We loved it and highly recommend!
Wonderful hosts, we are repeat renters and this is our favorite place, by far!

A great stay. Kayak was excellent. Amenities were awesome in kitchen and every room. Home is a bit dark so open curtains. Good TV services. Sunsets breath taking. WOW!. Price for only two of us was a bit high, but we chose it . We took hikes in several state parks that were beautiful. Hundreds of Orange Groves were gorgeous, filled with fruit.

Great get away location with lots to do or just relax!!
Really enjoyed staying with Phil!!
What a nice relaxing place to stay. Very well equipped and great hosts. We will certaining be back.
Very good!
It’s a excellent place and would highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking to have a great time.

We enjoyed our stay at the lake house! Spent a lot of time fishing and sailing on the aluminum boat with trolling motor which was provided by Phil and Sonya. The house is very clean and cozy, the territory is safe for kids.

We are return guests because we cant find ANY negatives about the home or property! It really is peaceful and very safe! The views, the kind and warm hospitality will keep us returning! This truly is a piece of serenity and I may add...a ton if fun!!!

Breathtaking views! Phil and Sonya are terrific hosts and their property is pristine! The whole house is comfy and super inviting with a pool/ping pong table, games, dvds, and so much more! The lake views are magnificent both inside the home and out! We found this property extremely peaceful and a terrific place to escape and enjoy serenity! Great for a romantic getaway, family adventure, or even a business stay, no question, we will return!!!

Always enjoy our stay at Lake Letta Lakehouse.
Phil and Sonya are excellent host.
Wishing are stay was longer.
Beautiful, relaxing, enjoying the sun rise and sunset.
We will be back to visit again.
Thank you Phil and Sonya
Take care.
Gary and Stephanie Best.
Very Nice.

This place was absolutelyamazing!! We felt so much at home! The view is just breathtaking! There was never a dull moment between the lake fun, the ralaxing view, the pool table, and games we all had an amazing time! Including our pup Nala! We will definitely be back! Can't wait to make more family memories!!
A very clean, nice, and cozy environment. House had a relaxing atmosphere. The boats were very fun to go cruise the lake.
We would recommend a stay. Its great with Pool table, Boats and bbq ☺️
Highly recommended. Great communication, great location. Perfect for our needs.

Nothing beats waking up and looking outside to a beautiful lake view, sitting on a shaded patio sipping coffee, or walking out to dock over water and sitting on swing sipping coffee, every single day of your stay! And our dogs loved it too! I almost hate to write a good review, as others will come, and we want to keep it for ourselves, ha! House had all the amenities needed too, very comfortable!
This is a great space on a lovely lake. The cottage is roomy & comfortable and Phil & Sonya are friendly & welcoming. We had a wonderful time !

We are very happy with our stay at the house of Phil and Sonya. It's a very beautiful place near a clear lake, great for bass fishing. The home is spacious, has everything you need. The sunsets are remarkably beautiful. There is an electric boat and kayak provided. The owners are very friendly, they answered all our questions, told us about all the local sights, and treated us with local delicious oranges. We recommend this house for a great remote vacation.

This house feels like a true cottage, warm, cozy and a great lake view. However, it's on a busy road and we found the surrounding area quite depressed and uninspiring. If you would have 6 people in your party, be aware there's only one really outdated bathroom in the house.

always a great stay at lake Letta.
Will be back in the Future.
For a hole week.
thank you Phil and Sonya
This is a great little house with a magnificent view of the lake.

Very relaxing. House was like home away from home. Spacious beautiful views .Fishing watching the sunset. Cacie running around the yard chasing lizards .Would love to come up again. Thank you again Phil and Sonya Gary and Stephanie Best. Cacie too

Lake home perfect for relaxing and enjoying nature. Home is clean, comfortable, well-equipped, comfortable beds. A peaceful fishing spot for hubby's birthday getaway. would return again and recommend to others. thank you Phil and Sonia.
We found everything we need for a successful stay. Plenty of space, access to the lake with jetty, terrace, equipped kitchen. Very nice contact with the owners.
Great house. Right on Lake Letta. Amazing dock. House is very spacious.
Great weekend getaway!
Great Place, Great Location, and Super Easy Going, I'll be back:)

The Lake House is on a lake, you can sit in the back yard and watch the ducks, cranes and other wildlife and well as some gorgeous sunsets. The house has everything you need to cook, a great collection of books to read, dvds to watch on tv and a pool table/ping pong table. The beds were comfy. There is a highway out front, but we did not notice any real noise inside. Phil and Sonya were always just a phone call away. The fenced yard was great for our little dogs to experience real freedom, they loved it. A real peaceful place to getaway.

We had a lovely month in Florida. We love everything about Highlands County and found your lake house perfect. We are grateful for your permission to bring our dog. Cooper loved the fenced yard and dock walking. We all enjoyed the row boat, birds, and peacefulness. Thanks for sharing.
This was the 4th time Sonya and Phil shared their home with us. The peace and quiet of this comfortable home has us looking forward to our next stay.
This place was awesome. The lake was still a little high but still calming and relaxing. Will defintiely try to come back for longer stay next time. Awesome host. Very clean.
If you enjoy quiet, fishing, or simply need a peaceful place to just be, this is that place!!
Lovely little home on the water. We thoroughly enjoyed watching the sunset over the lake. Everything you could need for vacation or work in the area is provided!
